snippet.title: OVRDARK: A Do Not Open Story | Official Trailer | New PlayStation®VR2 Game
snippet.description:
On March 29th, you'll be able to enjoy the PSVR2 video game you've been waiting for! A virtual reality adventure you won't want to miss out on (and you won't be escaping either).

Prepare to plunge into the sinister depths of the mansion, where you'll confront the malevolent presence of Mike Goreng, your former friend turned ruthless enemy. 

Explore terrifying rooms and solve twisted puzzles as you fight to survive. Virtual reality will immerse you in a nightmare world where every shadow could conceal a deadly threat. Experience tangible fear as you confront your worst nightmares in "OVRDARK".

Immerse yourself in the ultimate virtual reality experience as you uncover the macabre connection between "OVRDARK" and "DO NOT OPEN". Only the brave will unravel the dark secrets of the mansion and escape its lethal embrace.

Wishlist OVRDARK now on the Playstation Store! 👉 https://store.playstation.com/en-gr/concept/10007384

 #PSVR2 #psvr2games #RV #virtualreality #playstation #ps5games #ps5
